name: VargFren Quest 1: Seasons in The Abyss of Tartarsås
name_original: VargFren Quest 1: Seasons in The Abyss of Tartarsås
description:
VargFren Quest is a lousy, failed sequel to The Youtube Poop Saga, but forgets it quickly and now its about VargFren instead, and uses other modern (dated) memes and badly edited pics and Tail Gets Trolled memes.

Plot: VargFren leaves his home ... and time and space chugs a dick and dies. So he must fix it and remember the immortal words of the modern poet 50 Cents: " Get rich or die tryin, but I ain't."

PS: This is complete game. you can complete the game in less than an hour if you know exactly what to do. Also, it lacks polish.

If something is wrong with the game,  just tell me, I have no playtesters for the moment.

This game will be open sourced later after I fixed the badly listed data in game.
